alert.note: Alert for Noble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 12:05AM EST until further notice by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...A portion of east central Ohio, including the following county, Noble. * WHEN...Until 715 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1205 AM EST, Heavy rainfall earlier today and continued runoff. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dexter City. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
